name: 2D Football Madness
description:
Originally released the 1st of June, 2013, this game's purpose was to test scene and UI programming in Unity.

Play as either Green Guy or Yellow Guy in this 2 player (or 1 player playing both characters) local only game. The goal is to get the purple ball in the opponents goal while navigating through a sea of constantly falling pills. Try your best!

Note: The ball can glitch below the stage, at which point I recommend restarting the game. 

Music used is SwangYoThang2 by Tallulah Goodtimes: https://soundcloud.com/tallulahgoodtimes/swangyothang2
